stepAnswer: No, only matrices that represent the coefficients and constants of linear equations can be written as systems of equations.
stepTitle: Can any matrix be written as a system of linear equations?
choices: Yes, any matrix can be written as a system of linear equations.
No, only matrices that represent the coefficients and constants of linear equations can be written as systems of equations.
Yes, all matrices can be written as systems of equations if we choose the right number of variables.
No, matrices cannot be written as systems of linear equations in any case.
